biotools.summary: Searchable collection of biomedical books linked to terms in PubMed abstracts; when viewing an abstract, click on Books link to see phrases in abstract hyperlinked to book sections.

bioschemas.name: NCBI Bookshelf
bioschemas.summary: Searchable collection of biomedical books linked to terms in PubMed abstracts; when viewing an abstract, click on Books link to see phrases in abstract hyperlinked to book sections.
